response.original_title: If I were to be reborn: Visual Anthology Series
response.overview: The first in a series of visual poems interwoven with poetry, images, sound, and recitations. It is neither a landscape with poems nor a drama of poets. What exists here are the murmurs of a heart enlightened by poetry. This is a visual anthology of the original landscape of the soul engraved in the depths of modern people's memories and various poems that heal their hearts, with "Kenji Miyazawa, who continues to reincarnate" as the theme.
response.title: If I were to be reborn: Visual Anthology Series
